name: suil
description: Lightweight C library for loading and wrapping LV2 plugin UIs
unavailable_reason: Repository is on gitlab, not GitHub. Limited analysis available.

readme.summary: README provides only a brief description with an external link, offering no practical documentation for installation, usage, or troubleshooting.
readme.top_issue: No installation instructions, usage examples, or API documentation provided in the README itself

common_complaints: Build failures and compilation errors across different versions
Window sizing and UI wrapping issues
Lack of new releases blocking feature adoption
sentiment.summary: Suil shows signs of maintenance decline with unresolved build issues spanning years, no recent releases, and recurring toolkit compatibility problems that frustrate users attempting to use the library.

concerns: No commits in past 6 months despite last commit being recent (Jan 8, 2026)
Zero activity metrics across all categories (issues, PRs, contributors)
Unknown last release date suggests lack of version management
No open issues or PRs indicates either very low usage or abandoned state
positive_signals: No open issues to indicate unresolved problems
maintenance.summary: Package appears stale with no meaningful development activity in the past 6 months despite a recent commit timestamp, suggesting potential maintenance abandonment.
